cache_size_min.description: The minimum size (in size_units) of the ssd cache. The cache will be expanded if this exceeds the current size of the cache.

ssid.description: The ID of the array to manage (as configured on the web services proxy).

name.description: The name of the SSD cache to manage

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

io_type.description: The type of workload to optimize the cache for.

size_unit.description: The unit to be applied to size arguments

disk_count.description: The minimum number of disks to use for building the cache. The cache will be expanded if this number exceeds the number of disks already in place

state.description: Whether the specified SSD cache should exist or not.

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.
